text: How would you go about building a module or an editable area of a page that never needs to be used again? Modules are re-usable but this just needs to be an editable section. Can you point me to the right guide if there is one?

There's several themes on <https://themeforest.net/category/cms-themes/HubSpot-cms-hub> that incorporate Bootstrap, but they all pretty much layer it on top of the Boilerplate. As <@U033VNNBBBP> said, it get's dirty and bloats css. Really needs to be created from scratch. I've looked at it a few times, but it's a heavy lift. I was looking at <https://reactstrap.github.io/> to model the props to HubSpot module fields.
